translations: n．州长职位：指担任州长的职位或职责。
· He has held two governorships in the past.
他过去担任过两次州长。

sentences.sentence: Some may also be offered plum ambassadorships or provincial governorships.
sentences.translation: 有些人可能得到大使或者州长的肥差。

sentences.sentence: Moreover, the PRI has always retained the majority of state governorships.
sentences.translation: 此外，PRI一直占有多数的州长职位。

sentences.sentence: They are also projected to make a net gain of at least five governorships.
sentences.translation: 他们还计划，净收益至少得是5个州长。
